Html:
Truly an awesome library, very performant and use to work with.

Is there any way to declare / initialize variables within the expression. 

Pseudo Code

let angle be something

If (something is true, angle = 1, angle = 2)

I can do this declaring variables and using calcengine (I think) but it would be great to be able to do this directly from the expression


Thanks

 

Steve Hayles
